name: Cyber Defense (itch) (MJ3Dart)
description:
In the deep web of Cyber Space, you're protecting the mother board from dangerous viruses. It is your goal to protect the mother board from being destroyed and become corrupted by set viruses. Can you go through the eight waves and come out on top. 

How to Play

Click any where on the wall space while holding down "1" , "2" , or "3" to spawn turrets. 

In order to progress, you must eliminate a set amount of enemies.
